name: Lockdown 2024
description:
Lockdown 2024 is a point-and-click adventure game with a linear story line. It is about a young man (18) who’s lived a very sheltered life. His father and stepmother allowed no extracurricular activity, no internet, and no fraternizing with the opposite sex. A new strain of Covid is discovered and the government has instituted a new lockdown. Our hero’s father passed away during the first pandemic and now he’s the only man in a house full of women. He will need to attend university (college) on-line, help the women around the house and discover some secrets about his and his family’s past.
Features:
Over 5000 images
300+ Animations
All images rendered in 4k (3840x2160)
4 Engaging (skippable) mini-games; Lock picking, Fix the pipes, Computer Hacking, Basketball
3 Preset Options of play style to allow you to play as you want (can be fine-tuned in game)
Over 15 exciting scenes to unlock
23 separate locations to exploreThe housematesIndicates a relationship that is customizable.
Your stepmom, Devon, is the matriarch of the house. She’s very strict and sometimes overbearing.
Maria, your step-grandma, is Devon’s mother. She’s kind and loving and serves as a teacher to our hero.
Amber, you stepsister, is Devon’s eldest daughter. Amber is fashion conscious and more worldly than our hero. She’s also really mean.
Emma, your other stepsister*, is Amber’s younger sister. She’s sweet and innocent and is the same age as the main character.
Jasmin is friends with Amber. She’s sporty and very promiscuous.
Naomi is an exchange student and friends with Emma. She likes computers, cosplay, and other geeky stuff.
The live-in maid Isabella starts working in the house just as the outbreak begins.
